languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, докладываю — мне продолжают поступать сообщения о нарушениях в работе корабельных систем. Теперь мы столкнулись с необъяснимыми перепадами температур. Сбои функций термоконтроля наблюдаются не только в отдельных отсеках и палубах, но даже в снаряжении солдат. Несколько членов экипажа пострадали от ожогов и обморожения".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, докладываю — мне продолжают поступать сообщения о нарушениях в работе корабельных систем. Теперь мы столкнулись с необъяснимыми перепадами температур. Сбои функций термоконтроля наблюдаются не только в отдельных отсеках и палубах, но даже в снаряжении солдат. Несколько членов экипажа пострадали от ожогов и обморожения".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, I keep receiving reports about malfunctions among the various ship systems. This time we are dealing with inexplicable temperature fluctuations. Thermal control failures were observed not only in individual compartments but even in the soldiers' protective equipment. Several crew members have suffered from burns and frostbite."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, докладываю — мне продолжают поступать сообщения о нарушениях в работе корабельных систем. Теперь мы столкнулись с необъяснимыми перепадами температур. Сбои функций термоконтроля наблюдаются не только в отдельных отсеках и палубах, но даже в снаряжении солдат. Несколько членов экипажа пострадали от ожогов и обморожения".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, I keep receiving reports about malfunctions among the ship's various systems. This time we are dealing with inexplicable fluctuations in temperature. The thermal control failures were observed not only in individual compartments but even in the soldiers' protective equipment. Several crew members have suffered from burns and frostbite."

"Lord Captain, I keep receiving reports about malfunctions among the ship's various systems. This time we are dealing with inexplicable fluctuations in temperature. The thermal control failures were observed not only in individual compartments but even in the soldiers' protective equipment. Several crew members have suffered from burns and frostbite."

"Lord Captain, I keep receiving reports about malfunctions among the various ship systems. This time we are dealing with inexplicable temperature fluctuations. Thermal control failures were observed not only in individual compartments but even in the soldiers' protective equipment. Several crew members have suffered from burns and frostbite."

"Lord Captain, I keep receiving reports about malfunctions among the various ship systems. This time we are dealing with inexplicable temperature fluctuations. Thermal control failures were observed not only in individual compartments but even in the soldiers' protective equipment. Several crew members have suffered from burns and frostbite."

"Lord Captain, I keep receiving reports about malfunctions among the various ship systems. This time we are dealing with inexplicable temperature fluctuations. Thermal control failures were observed not only in individual compartments but even in the soldiers' protective equipment. Several crew members have suffered from burns and frostbite."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, on continue de me signaler des dysfonctionnements touchant différents systèmes du vaisseau. Cette fois, nous avons affaire à des fluctuations de température inexplicables. Des défaillances du contrôle thermique ont été rapportées non seulement dans des compartiments individuels, mais aussi dans l'équipement protecteur des soldats. Plusieurs membres d'équipage ont souffert de brûlures et d'engelures. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I keep receiving reports about malfunctions among the various ship systems. This time we are dealing with inexplicable temperature fluctuations. Thermal control failures were observed not only in individual compartments but even in the soldiers' protective equipment. Several crew members have suffered from burns and frostbite."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, on continue de me signaler des dysfonctionnements touchant différents systèmes du vaisseau. Cette fois, nous avons affaire à des fluctuations de température inexplicables. Des défaillances du contrôle thermique ont été rapportées non seulement dans des compartiments individuels, mais aussi dans l'équipement protecteur des soldats. Plusieurs membres d'équipage ont souffert de brûlures et d'engelures. »

languages.text: “舰长大人，我不断收到报告，说飞船各个系统发生故障。这次的问题是莫名其妙的温度故障，不仅影响到了许多舱室，就连士兵的防护设备都出现了热控故障。已经有好几名船员被烧伤或被冻伤。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I keep receiving reports about malfunctions among the various ship systems. This time we are dealing with inexplicable temperature fluctuations. Thermal control failures were observed not only in individual compartments but even in the soldiers' protective equipment. Several crew members have suffered from burns and frostbite."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我不断收到报告，说飞船各个系统发生故障。这次的问题是莫名其妙的温度故障，不仅影响到了许多舱室，就连士兵的防护设备都出现了热控故障。已经有好几名船员被烧伤或被冻伤。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ich empfange laufend Berichte über Fehlfunktionen in verschiedenen Schiffssystemen. Dieses Mal haben wir es mit unerklärlichen Temperaturschwankungen zu tun. Die Temperaturkontrolle ist nicht nur in einzelnen Modulen ausgefallen, sondern auch in der Schutzausrüstung der Soldaten. Mehrere Crewmitglieder haben Verbrennungen und Erfrierungen erlitten."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I keep receiving reports about malfunctions among the various ship systems. This time we are dealing with inexplicable temperature fluctuations. Thermal control failures were observed not only in individual compartments but even in the soldiers' protective equipment. Several crew members have suffered from burns and frostbite."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ich empfange laufend Berichte über Fehlfunktionen in verschiedenen Schiffssystemen. Dieses Mal haben wir es mit unerklärlichen Temperaturschwankungen zu tun. Die Temperaturkontrolle ist nicht nur in einzelnen Modulen ausgefallen, sondern auch in der Schutzausrüstung der Soldaten. Mehrere Crewmitglieder haben Verbrennungen und Erfrierungen erlitten."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, sigo recibiendo avisos sobre el mal funcionamiento de algunos de los sistemas de la nave. Esta vez se trata de variaciones de temperatura inexplicables. Se han detectado errores de control térmico no solo en compartimentos individuales, sino también en el equipo protector de los soldados. Esto ha provocado quemaduras y congelaciones en varios miembros de la tripulación».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I keep receiving reports about malfunctions among the various ship systems. This time we are dealing with inexplicable temperature fluctuations. Thermal control failures were observed not only in individual compartments but even in the soldiers' protective equipment. Several crew members have suffered from burns and frostbite."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, sigo recibiendo avisos sobre el mal funcionamiento de algunos de los sistemas de la nave. Esta vez se trata de variaciones de temperatura inexplicables. Se han detectado errores de control térmico no solo en compartimentos individuales, sino también en el equipo protector de los soldados. Esto ha provocado quemaduras y congelaciones en varios miembros de la tripulación».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、船の至るところのシステムで誤作動が起きているとの報告がまた届きました。今回は、不可解な温度変動が起こっています。温度管理の不具合は各区画以外に、兵士の装備でも観測されました。数名のクルーが火傷と凍傷の被害に苦しんでいます」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I keep receiving reports about malfunctions among the various ship systems. This time we are dealing with inexplicable temperature fluctuations. Thermal control failures were observed not only in individual compartments but even in the soldiers' protective equipment. Several crew members have suffered from burns and frostbite."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、船の至るところのシステムで誤作動が起きているとの報告がまた届きました。今回は、不可解な温度変動が起こっています。温度管理の不具合は各区画以外に、兵士の装備でも観測されました。数名のクルーが火傷と凍傷の被害に苦しんでいます」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, çeşitli gemi sistemlerinde arızalar meydana geldiğine dair sürekli raporlar alıyorum. Bu kez de ısıda açıklanamaz dalgalanmalar yaşanıyor. Isıl kontrol arızaları; yalnızca belli kompartımanlarda gözlemlenmiyor, askerlerin koruyucu ekipmanlarında bile görülebiliyor. Bazı tayfalar yanıktan ve soğuk yanığından mustarip."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, I keep receiving reports about malfunctions among the various ship systems. This time we are dealing with inexplicable temperature fluctuations. Thermal control failures were observed not only in individual compartments but even in the soldiers' protective equipment. Several crew members have suffered from burns and frostbite."
